item.title: penelope fitzgerald
item.description:
penelope

Her characters are people in a muddle, hopeless cases and outsiders whom she called exterminatees. She does not think that people get what they deserve in this world. Her style is plain, and subtle. She is evasive and reserved. She is inspired by Ruskin and William Morris.

“novels arise out of the shortcomings of history.”

“they are all gone into the world of light.”

Cavafy

I have gazed so much on beauty that my eyes overflow with it.
